name: New Rally-X 64
overview: A new arcade racing conversion of Rally-X by Jake79 with music by Merman and sound effects by NM156. The original game Rally-X was an overhead maze game released in the 1980's by Namco in which you drove around a maze like screen collecting flags for a high score and avoiding other cars or well play placed rocks. Use your smoke screens and your wile to grab the flags without getting hit by the kamikaze baddies. And don't forget to keep an eye on your gas tank and keep it filled when you can.
